Detailed Description

Creates the photon maps.

Constructor.

Parameters:
sc : the scene to photon-trace
nb_photons : the size (in number of photons) of the photon-map
photon_depth : the maximum number of reflection/refraction of a photon

Directly calls the build_photon_tree method (photon_mapping phase)
